entry.data:
CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS THIS MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE LOWER 60S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS AROUND 40
